original_text: They do not obey God now. As a result God has been very kind to you. That has happened so that God may now be very kind to them too. They do not obey God now. As a result God has been very kind to you. That has happened so that God may now be very kind to them too.
korean_text: 이와 같이 이 사람들이 순종하지 아니하니 이는 너희에게 베푸시는 긍휼로 이제 그들도 긍휼을 얻게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: They do not obey God now.
As a result God has been very kind to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 하나님께서 당신에게 매우 친절하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: God may now be very kind to them too.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 지금 그들에게도 매우 친절하시기 위함입니다.

sentences.original_text: They do not obey God now.
As a result God has been very kind to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 하나님께서 당신에게 매우 친절하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: God may now be very kind to them too.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 지금 그들에게도 매우 친절하시기 위함입니다.
